label: [Introspection] Develop Node-RED nodes in Node-RED
info:
::: aim

Create a setup whereby I can create, edit and install Node-RED nodes within Node-RED.

:::

::: discussion 

If I want to extend my Emacs, I don't open Vi to create my extensions, I do this in Emacs. I extend Emacs *with* Emacs.

Why should this be any different in Node-RED?

Hence this flow to demonstrate that idea.

:::

::: explanation

Work In Progress.

This will install a new Node called TarBall for creating tar balls, gzipped. These tarballs can then be installed as new nodes within Node-RED.

:::
